    • edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.action.EditMonitoringListAction

  • public class EditMonitoringListAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles changes (adds and removes) to the monitoring list for a certain HCP.

        Adds a patient to the current HCP's remote monitoring list

        patientMID - the patient
        permissions - Array indicating what data the patient is allowed to enter. Ordered by Systolic Blood Pressure, Diastolic Blood Pressure, Glucose Level, Weight, Pedometer Reading.
        ??:
